metadata.feature_description: Configure Publisher module settings including display options, social sharing, and behavior

steps.action: Navigate to News page with Publisher module
steps.actual: Publisher module found on News page with settings icon visible

steps.action: Click settings icon to open Publisher Settings panel
steps.expected: Settings panel opens showing workflow and sharing options
steps.actual: Publisher Settings panel opened showing Select a Workflow dropdown and Enable sharing checkboxes for Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and RSS

steps.action: Enable Twitter sharing (click unchecked Twitter checkbox)
Disable Facebook sharing (click checked Facebook checkbox)
Enable RSS feed (click unchecked RSS checkbox)
Change workflow from Direct Publish to Content Approval using dropdown
steps.expected: Workflow dropdown shows Content Approval as selected
steps.actual: Workflow successfully changed to Content Approval

steps.action: Click Save button after making changes
steps.actual: Settings panel closed after clicking Save

steps.action: Reopen settings panel to verify persistence
steps.expected: All changed settings should persist (Content Approval workflow, Twitter enabled, Facebook disabled, RSS enabled)
steps.actual: All settings persisted correctly - Workflow shows Content Approval, Twitter checked, Facebook unchecked, LinkedIn checked, Pinterest checked, RSS checked

steps.action: Change workflow from Content Approval to Direct Publish
steps.actual: Workflow changed to Direct Publish in UI

steps.expected: Changes should be discarded, workflow should revert to Content Approval
steps.actual: Changes were discarded, workflow reverted to Content Approval as expected

observations: Code suggests TopTagsPageSize and TopAuthorsPageSize settings exist in ModuleSettings.ascx, but these appear in DNN module settings (via Module Actions > Settings) rather than the Publisher-specific settings panel tested here

The suggested test scenarios 'Configure posts per page', 'Set default view mode (list/grid)', 'Set featured post count', 'Configure tag display limits', and 'Reset to default settings' do not have corresponding UI elements in the Publisher Settings panel
The Publisher Settings panel provides: Workflow selection dropdown, and social sharing toggles for Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and RSS
Validation of setting value ranges is handled by the dropdown selections (workflow) and checkbox toggles (sharing options) - no freeform input fields requiring validation were found
